mods.abstract: Female adult, composition head on cloth body, wire supported arms, felt hands and limbs, molded and painted features, white cotton under-pants and skirt, red wool skirt, floral print dress tucked up in front, white lace decorated cap, grey knitted shawl. Accompanying information describes as Sligo(1830). The Irish woman wore colorful clothing, a homespun skirt was tucked up in front showing a fancy petticoat or a fancy dress was tucked up at the sides showing a homespun skirt. She also wore a lace mop cap or a knitted snood and a fancy shawl. The costume is hand-made in Ireland. Doll body, hand and machine-made.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
